column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. al-ḥusayn waraml al-māyah. qaṣīdah. ṭawīl
al-ṣan‘ah. ḥusaynun waraml al-māyah. tawshīḥ raml lābin sa‘īd al-miknāsī

column2: yā rasūl al-lah yā baḥr al-wafā

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. inqilāb al-raml. qaṣīdah. mkhl‘ al-basīṭ
al-ṣan‘ah. raml al-māyah. zajal mashṭūr al-raml

column2: mā sabānī fī al-milāḥ ilā al-rasūl
alā yā muḥibb al-muṣṭafá zid ṣabābatan

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. inqilāb al-raml. qaṣīdah. basīṭ li’aḥmad al-‘arūsī

column3: fāinzil laqad nilt mā tahwá atakhtār

column2: hadhā al-muḥaṣṣab hadhā al-khayf khīf muná

column3: wadhā huw al-jaza‘ fāibk dhā huw al-ghār
